world.name: Inside a Human Cell
world.subject: biology
world.description: Explore the interior of a living cell
world.prompt: Floating inside a human cell with organelles visible

positions.start: Near the cell membrane, gateway to the cell
positions.forward: Moving toward the nucleus, the control center

educationalPoints: The cell membrane controls what enters and leaves
The nucleus contains DNA, the genetic blueprint
Mitochondria produce ATP, the energy currency
suggestedQuestions: What is DNA and where is it found?
